name: Treasure Trawler
description:
Press M to open credits

Venture into tombs, collect cursed treasure, and get back out alive!

The curse won't let you leave with the treasures easily, but it won't let you die easily either. Collect 3 treasures in a level  to receive the staff of wonders, giving you score multipliers. Try to get a high score, and post it in a comment or review!

Controls: A - Left, D - Right, Space - Jump

Made with Construct 3; MIDI music composed in Guitar Pro 6 and converted using Gashisoft GXSCC; Sound effects generated with BFXR; Art & animation made with Photoshop CS6 and Construct 3 Editor
